prompt_speaker_story_well_told_final.name: speaker_story_well_told_final
prompt_speaker_story_well_told_final.prompt: ## How well do you think you told the story?

prompt_speaker_perception_of_listener_en.name: speaker_perception_of_listener_enjoy_final
prompt_speaker_perception_of_listener_en.prompt: ## How much do you think a listener would enjoy your story?

prompt_speaker_comfort_final.name: speaker_comfort_final
prompt_speaker_comfort_final.prompt: ## How comfortable did you feel telling the story?

prompt_comp1.name: comp1
prompt_comp1.prompt: ## How many different people will tell you a story?

prompt_comp2.name: comp2
prompt_comp2.prompt: ## What are you being asked to do differently in each round?
responses: Change the language you speak in (French, English, Spanish...)
Change whether you tell or listen to the story
Change the length of the story

prompt_comp3.name: comp3
prompt_comp3.prompt: ## Should you let the speaker know what instructions you have been given in each round?
responses: Yes, tell them what you are being asked to do
No, don't say what your instructions were
prompt_comp3.value: No, don't say what your instructions were

prompt_listener_story_well_told_1.name: listener_story_well_told_1
prompt_listener_story_well_told_1.prompt: ## How well did the speaker tell the story?

prompt_listener_enjoy_1.name: listener_enjoy_1
prompt_listener_enjoy_1.prompt: ## How much did you enjoy the story?

prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.name: listener_perception_of_speaker_comfort_1
prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.prompt: ## How comfortable did the **speaker** seem telling the story?

prompt_listener_story_well_told_2.name: listener_story_well_told_2
prompt_listener_story_well_told_2.prompt: ## How well did the speaker tell the story?

prompt_listener_enjoy_2.name: listener_enjoy_2
prompt_listener_enjoy_2.prompt: ## How much did you enjoy the story?

prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.name: listener_perception_of_speaker_comfort_2
prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.prompt: ## How comfortable did the **speaker** seem telling the story?

prompt_listener_story_well_told_3.name: listener_story_well_told_3
prompt_listener_story_well_told_3.prompt: ## How well did the speaker tell the story?

prompt_listener_enjoy_3.name: listener_enjoy_3
prompt_listener_enjoy_3.prompt: ## How much did you enjoy the story?

prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.name: listener_perception_of_speaker_comfort_3
prompt_listener_perception_of_speaker_co.prompt: ## How comfortable did the **speaker** seem telling the story?

prompt_listener_best_speaker.name: listener_best_speaker
prompt_listener_best_speaker.prompt:
## Please rank the **speakers** you heard in order from best (at the top) to worst (at the bottom)

You can click-and-drag the options below into your preferred order.

prompt_listener_best_story.name: listener_best_story
prompt_listener_best_story.prompt:
## Please rank the **stories** you heard in order from best (at the top) to worst (at the bottom)

You can click-and-drag the options below into your preferred order.

prompt_listener_compliance_expressive.name: listener_compliance_expressive
prompt_listener_compliance_expressive.prompt:
## How well were you able to **increase** your responsiveness when we asked you to?

(This won't affect your payment, we are just just interested in how difficult the task was)

prompt_listener_compliance_minimal.name: listener_compliance_minimal
prompt_listener_compliance_minimal.prompt:
## How well were you able to **decrease** your responsiveness when we asked you to?

(This won't affect your payment, we are just just interested in how difficult the task was)

prompt_listener_compliance_natural.name: listener_compliance_natural
prompt_listener_compliance_natural.prompt:
## How well were you able to **listen naturally** we asked you to?

(This won't affect your payment, we are just just interested in how difficult the task was)

prompt_listener_compliance_open_response.name: listener_compliance_open_response
prompt_listener_compliance_open_response.prompt:
## Was there anything that made the experience difficult?

Did you have any particular challenges changing your listening behavior?

How could we help future listeners understand the task or perform better?

prompt_speaker_best_time_told.name: speaker_best_time_told
prompt_speaker_best_time_told.prompt:
## Please rank the times you told the story in order from best (at the top) to worst (at the bottom).

You can click-and-drag the options below into your preferred order.
responses: During the final telling to the camera
value: During the final telling to the camera

prompt_speaker_best_listener.name: speaker_best_listener
prompt_speaker_best_listener.prompt:

prompt_speaker_whose_story.name: speaker_whose_story
prompt_speaker_whose_story.prompt: ## You had the option to tell someone else's story if you couldn't think of one of your own. Whose story did you tell?

prompt_difference_between_listeners.name: difference_between_listeners
prompt_difference_between_listeners.prompt: ## Was there a difference between how the listers behaved? If you noticed a difference, can you describe it?
prompt_difference_between_listeners.value: The first guy was super quiet.

prompt_speaker_what_were_we_studying.name: speaker_what_were_we_studying
prompt_speaker_what_were_we_studying.prompt: ## If you had to guess, what would you say this study was trying to measure?
